title: Has anyone written a book and published good things about Trump? - Quora

response.answer_text: “The Conservative Case for Trump” by Phyllis Phyllis Schlafly BLITZ: Trump Will Smash the Left and Win by David Horowitz Let Trump Be Trump: The Inside Story of His Rise to the Presidency The United States of Trump: How the President Really Sees America by Bill O’Reilly The Deep State: How an Army of Bureaucrats Protected Barack Obama and Is Working to Destroy the Trump Agenda And several hundred more on Amazon.

Ann Coulter wrote a book entitled, In Trump We Trust: E Pluribus Awesome! After being paid for that effort, she has flipped. She tweeted, "So Stormy says she and Trump had sex only once. I guess if you want the guy to screw you repeatedly, you have to be one of his voters." Coulter collects on both sides of the market.

Scott Adams (creator of Dilbert) has written a book on Trump and hypnosis/persuasion called Win Bigly. Newt Gingrich also has a few on his politics, or rather the politics he would want Trump to pursue.
